title: EPIC-009: Custom Exception Hierarchy

epic.title: Shared Utilities & DTOs
epic.goal: Implement shared code: Pydantic DTOs for API contracts, custom exception hierarchy, common utilities (date formatting, token counting, retry decorators)

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Base exception: DomainException (attributes: code, message, details)
Domain exceptions: InsufficientTokensError (402), DialogNotFoundError (404), DialogForbiddenError (403), ValidationError (422), LLMProviderError (500/504)
Exception messages exclude sensitive data (no user content, tokens)
Error handlers map exceptions to HTTP status codes and structured responses
Unit tests verify exception raising and handling
description: Define base exception class and domain-specific exceptions (InsufficientTokensError, DialogNotFoundError, LLMProviderError, etc.), map to HTTP status codes.
